info.name: Asaas RESTful API - Complete Collection
info.description:
Complete API collection for Central and Tenant endpoints

## üìä Collection Stats
- **Total Endpoints:** 235+ endpoints
- **Central API:** 37+ endpoints (10 sections)
- **Tenant API:** 198+ endpoints (40 sections)
- **Last Updated:** 2025-11-03 23:09:34

## üîê How to Get Tokens:

### Option 1: Automatic (Recommended)
1. Set Collection Variables:
   - `base_url`: http://asaas.local
   - `tenant_base_url`: http://tenant1.asaas.local
   - `admin_email`: admin@example.com
   - `admin_password`: password

2. Run 'Central Login' or 'Tenant Login' request
3. Token will be automatically saved to `central_token` or `tenant_token` variable

### Option 2: Manual
1. Run the login request
2. Copy token from response
3. Go to Collection Variables
4. Paste token in `central_token` or `tenant_token`

### Option 3: Script
Run: `bash core/test-endpoints.sh`

## üìã Testing

### Test All Endpoints
```bash
cd core
./test-endpoints.sh
```

### Test Specific Endpoint
```bash
curl -X GET "http://asaas.local/api/central/v1/dashboard" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" \
  -H "Accept: application/json"
```

## üìö Documentation
- Full API Documentation: `docs/API_DOCUMENTATION.md`
- API Coverage Report: `docs/API_COVERAGE_REPORT.md`
- Implementation Status: `docs/API_IMPLEMENTATION_STATUS_REPORT.md`
